full_summary:
### Request for Supply Arrangement
#### Procurement Title
Costing Analysis

#### Government Contracting Entity Information

* **Contracting Entity Name:** Polar Knowledge Canada
* **Contracting Entity Address:**
	+ 170 Laurier Ave West, 2nd Floor
	+ Ottawa, ONTARIO, K1P 5V5
	+ Canada

#### Government Procurement Information

* **Procurement Category:** SRV (Service)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective Tendering
* **Notice Type:** Request for Supply Arrangement (RFSQA)
* **Trade Agreements:** This opportunity is covered under the following trade agreements:
	+ Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
	+ World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
	+ Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
	+ Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
	+ Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
	+ Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
	+ Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
	+ Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
	+ Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)

#### Tender Information

* **Solicitation Number:** 20240335
* **Publication Date:** 2024-06-18
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2024-07-04T14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2024-07-22
* **Expected Contract End Date:** 2025-05-31
* **Tender Status:** Expiration of tender

#### Tender Description

Polar Knowledge Canada invites qualified Supply Arrangement Holders to bid on the services required for the development of detailed cost estimations for various requirements, including taxes, travel, and living expenses, amendments, and other costs above the CKFTA threshold. The services involve the preparation of a fully costed model of options and the completion of required templates provided by the Minister of Finance. Qualified Financial Specialists will be required to provide support for the completion of these tasks.

Please find the full tender notice and bid solicitation documents at the following URL: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/40311/202
